newsitem.title: USA: Qualcomm promotes three unit executives.
newsitem.headline: Qualcomm promotes three unit executives.

text.p: Qualcomm Inc said Monday it had promoted three executives to head up some of the company's fastest growing businesses.

The company said Paul Jacobs was promoted to president of Qualcomm's Subscriber Products Division. Jacobs joined Qualcomm in 1990 and was named General Manager for Qualcomm's Subscriber Products Division in May 1995.
Subscriber Products builds the company's cellular phone handsets. Jacobs led the division from research and design to record breaking sales orders, product design and delivery.

Qualcomm said Don Schrock, who joined the company in January 1996 after more than 20 years experience in the semiconductor industry, was promoted to senior vice president and general manager of Qualcomm's ASICs Products Division. It said John Sarto, who joined Qualcomm's OmniTracs Division in January 1995, was promoted to president of the OmniTracs Division, which provides wireless communications for the U.S. trucking industry and international applications.
